title: Is music a major sin or minor sin in Islam? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music is neither major nor minor sin: It’s not a major sin because that wasn’t mentioned in Quran. All major sins have to be clearly mentioned in Quran.It’s not a minor sin because all hadiths about it were accepted by some scholars and refused by others.Islamic scholars that allowed music are too many that it’s hard to numerate them. Here are some of the greatest scholars from the first generations that concluded that music is Halāl (permissible): Abū Ḥāmid Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad al-Ghazālī (1058–1111) Abū Muḥammad ʿAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn Saʿīd ibn Ḥazm (994 - 1064) Ibn al-Eid Dakiki (1228-1302) Shahab al-Din Yahya ibn Habash Suhrawardi (1154-1191) Izz al-Din ibn 'Abd al-Salam (1181-1262) Abu Bakr ibn al-Arabi (1076-1148)Muhammad ash-Shawkani (1759–1839)Kamaluddin Ibn Tha’lab Al-Adfawi ( -748 AH)Ibn Tahir of Caesarea (1056-1113)Youcef Ibn Madison( -185 AH)And here are some contemporary scholars who had the same position: Sheikh Dr. Yusuf al-Qaradawi Sheikh Mahmud Shaltut Sheikh Mohammed al-Ghazali Sheikh Muhammad Rashid Rida Sheikh Muhammad Metwali Alsharawi Sheikh Dr. Adnan Ibrahim Dr. Nasr Farid Wasil Dr. Salman al-Ouda Dr. Ali Gomaa Dr. Muhammad ImaraDr. Muhammad Al-RussiFarid al-AnsariDr. Abdullah sumkSheikh Hasan al-AttarSheikh Muhammad Sayyid TantawySheikh Atiyyah SaqrDr. Saad Al-Din HilalyConclusion: Imam Shafi’i, one of the greatest legal minds in Islamic history says: “Allah does not punish where there is differing among religious scholars”.Music thus is not a sin, period. Asalamu alaykum Actually, listening to haram music is a major sin. But what music is haram? The following factors are the general rules forbid music / song: - If the music itself (the tune, instruments etc...) is Ghina meaning a music which is usually used in gatherings of sin. - If the words contain haram content (e.g. sex, drug use, violence). - If a woman is singing, a man cannot listen to the song.[1] Footnotes[1] Islamic Guidelines For TV, Music, And Social Networks
